entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
